attributes.action: Ask the government to support fisherman now the markets have closed
attributes.additional_details:
Fisherman get NO subsidies for lack of earnings due to bad weather or anything else.
Please please sign the this petition to ask the government to step in and give help to all of the fisherman who are totally on stop.
It has gone on far too long that they are totally left to deal with whatever is thrown at them, it’s a hard dangerous job and I hope people will give support.
Thank you
attributes.background:
After a really hard winter of wind and our fishing boat being tied up most of it, we go into the prawn season with confidence that we will survive another year. 
But no, we are told today that all export markets are closed to France and Spain and no one buys British fish!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You could start a petition calling on the Government to create a fund to support people in the fishing industry who have lost income due to the coronavirus outbreak,

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
